body.p: The County Administrative Board is the government's representative in the county with the aim of collaborating with other bodies such as municipalities, authorities, companies and organizations in order to achieve the national integration policy objectives.
The overall objective of the integration policy is

list.p: Equal rights, obligations and opportunities for everyone, irrespective of ethnic or cultural background.
an effective system for receiving and introduction of new arrivals
more people in work and more employers
equality in schools, improved language skills and educational opportunities for adults
positive development in neighbourhoods with widespread exclusion
common values in society characterized by increased diversity.

body.p: Integration commission of the County Administrative Boards

list.p: work to ensure that each county has contingency plans and the requisite capacity to receive and introduce new arrivals and others in need of protection
discuss and reach agreement with the municipal authorities on receiving newly arrived refugees and others in need of protection
promote cooperation between municipalities, authorities, companies and other organizations involved in activities for new arrivals
further develop cooperation at a regional level, particularly with regard to the coordination of municipal activities, such as Swedish for Immigrants (SFI) and social studies
follow up, organize and implement measures for new arrivals in the county
